title: [Large-Scale] Program for Increasing Adult Learner Engagement Through Game-Based Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic secondary science concepts and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Program for working professionals aiming to strengthen science-related job competencies, focusing on learning motivation through game mechanics and acquiring science principles applicable to real-life contexts

learning_goals: Science concept comprehension improved by over 20% through game-based learning activities
Over 80% of learners achieved positive growth in engagement metrics (question frequency, activity proactivity) in weekly formative assessments
Over 90% of learners acquired collaborative learning skills in team-based science problem-solving games
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
